name: My Little Restaurant Lite
description:
Try the Litest version of My Little Restaurant: charge-free, ad-free but still so much fun!

Grab a taste of what it's like to work in My Little Restaurant. Test your skills in this fully playable preview.
Lite version includes:

- four different restaurants
- additional Burger-making game
- extras and power-ups
- no advertising
- no time limits

Try My Little Restaurant Lite for free and we guarantee you will be hungry for more!!!
